name: ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_C generation rule
description: This generation rule aims to describe the generation of ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_C table within BIRD.
algorithm:
SET ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_C.INSTRMNT_ID = BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID 
WHERE BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID IN (
    SELECT BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID
    FROM BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL
    JOIN BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL
      ON BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID = BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID
    WHERE BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL.JNT_LBLTY_AMNT > 0 
);

logical_transformation_rule.algorithm:
SET ANCRDT_JNT_LBLTS_C.INSTRMNT_ID = BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID 
WHERE BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID IN (
    SELECT BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID
    FROM BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL
    JOIN BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL
      ON BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID = BIRD_INSTRMNT_EIL.INSTRMNT_ID
    WHERE BIRD_INSTRMNT_ENTTY_RL_ASSGNMNT_EIL.JNT_LBLTY_AMNT > 0 
);
